channel.title: Mods, Get Your Priorities Striaght
channel.description:
Perfect example of stupidity for you guys: 1. Stay the fuck out of the general section until you've become completely aware of the spam in the important sections. The important sections include:
[ul][li]Runescape Hacking and Development[/li] [li]Programming Forums[/li] [li]Graphics[/li][/ul]
This list, however, does not include the General section, where has been labeled before as the spam section by superior 'officers'.
2. If someone needs banned, or needs to be put under a 'probation', phucking tell Mopar or any of the other administrators that are supposed to take care of the fucking job.
3. Renaming topics and not closing them is a very [b]big no-no.[/b] What is the purpose of keeping it open? Why don't you sticky it for Christ's sake.
This is all I have for now. I've saved this to a .txt so I can repost it later after it has been deleted.

item.title: Mods, Get Your Priorities Striaght
item.dc:creator: @Xerxes Xerxes
item.description:
@Xerxes wrote:

Uhm, lets put it this way, I get banned for (30) days … you get happy… I get unbanned after two days, you start crying… etcetc. Cry more.

Read full topic

Or did it happen already and there is also another plan in place? I’ve been rather inactive and was curious if these changes have been made yet or not.[/quote]

i loled at ur boat.

item.title: Mods, Get Your Priorities Striaght
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

User prune and close regs for the win

We did it at RSR and then had an application forum. Barly any spam, a fun community and it is still slowly growing
Although were not leecher friendly there, hence the slogan ‘Leech and die’. So I guess its up to Mopar + other admins.

I have to say though if you closed regs, pruned thousands of noobs (from this site- not moparisthebest.com) and then spent a few weeks continuing to ban retards who post in the wrongs section. Then finally opened an applications forum and appointed a few mods this forum would soon become cleaner and rid of noobs. Application policy could be:

-If you can type properly and have good grammar your in.
-No moparscape/private server questions.

It’s just a suggestion, I’m not active, nor do I particulary behave properly (I admit it) at this forum but thats because I moderate and have to be serious at RSR. 3-4 weeks hard work? Then barly any trouble ever again… Just some thoughts Kthx Bai!

Read full topic

item.title: Mods, Get Your Priorities Striaght
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“Taylor, post:20, topic:11736”][quote author=Cheesehunk link=topic=17493.msg200336#msg200336 date=1157003309]
Could someonje please inform me on what happened last night? I was busy with a couple friends…
[/quote]0 def xp was spamming over 100 topics in the General section.[/quote]

Thanks.

I like Pwnd, and PaulT, but I wouldn’t choose them as mods. A good example of an excellent Mod/Admin would be Starblaster. He keeps serious, will joke around once in a while, but he does his job well.

I really don’t know who I would choose for a global mod… Maybe have some more section Mod’s, like Krich or something in the java section. No offence, but I don’t think we have much “Mod” material here.

EDIT: I have to agree with Regex here… http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,17461.msg197962.html#msg197962 I wish he never quit the Admin job in the first place, and never posted gay porn. He was a good admin.

Ahh, this brings be back to the days of Kaitnieks. Remember people like asdf? Waffendennis? (Still comes here sometimes…) Thats the kind of people we need to Moderate.

Read full topic
